ComicInfo.Summary:
The blood-drenched pro wrestling retelling of Macbeth continues. Having aided her husband in achieving his goal, Sharlene Frenzy focuses on pursuing her own wrestling ambitions, with unexpected, violent consequences. Elsewhere, Chuck Frenzy receives bad news that shakes him to his core. Can he avert from his wicked path, or is it already too late for him? And, on the horizon, the Crimson Cage awaits...
